column1: Jp
column2: En

column1:
白竜、力授けた
オレ、またお前のこと、試してやる
column2:
White Dragon gave me power.
I test you again.

column1: 試練の場、来い
column2: Trial grounds. Come.

column1:
――試練の場に入るエリアランク
確認して向かえ
column2:
...Trial Grounds Area Rank.
Check it. Go.

column1:
今回もオレ、お前、試してやる
試練の場、来い
column2:
Now, I test you.
To the trial grounds. Come.

column1:
――試練の場に入るエリアランク
確認して向かえ
column2:
...Trial Grounds Area Rank.
Check it. Go.

column1:
待ってた
オレ、共に戦う
column2:
Been waiting.
We fight together.

column1: この先、試練の敵いる
column2: Trial is ahead. Target is there.

column1:
お前、いいハンターなった
新しい技使える、大丈夫
column2:
You became good Hunter.
With new Arts, you'll do well.

column1:
技の継承、俺の家でやる
家で待つ
column2:
Learn the Art at Lodge.
Meet you there.

column1:
この技、強い弓
お前扱える、大丈夫
column2:
This strong bow move,
you can use, no problem.

column1:
お前、いいハンターなった
狙えば狙うほど、正確に射られるようになる
もっと成長できる
column2:
You, you're good Hunter now.
Take aim, shoot true.
Grow endlessly.

column1:
色んな矢、選んで使え
射ち方、試せ
column2:
Ye arrows. Many uses.
Try shooting 'em.

column1: あれ、最初の試練
column2: That is Test One.

column1: よし、次、第二の試練
column2:
Good. 
Next, Test Two.

column1: 第二の試練、射抜け
column2:
Test Two.
Get a bull's eye.

column1: いい調子、次で最後
column2:
Good pacing.
Last one.

column1: いた、最後の試練
column2: Next, the Final Test.

column1:
お前なら大丈夫
新しい技、使える
技の継承、俺の家でやる
column2:
You? Will do fine.
Inherit Arts at the Lodge.

column1: 様々な矢、使いこなすのがハンター
column2:
Many arrows to master.
Good Hunter uses 'em all.

column1: 回避して自分守る、大切なこと
column2:
Dodging, self-protection;
important.

column1: 最適距離、覚えろ
column2:
Remember;
stay in optimal range.

column1: 弱点狙う、大事
column2:
Most importantly;
target weaknesses.

column1: 狙う、射る、それだけ
column2:
Aim and shoot.
That's it.

column1: 敵の数、把握しろ
column2:
Count yer targets.
Stay wary.

column1: 間合い、ちゃんと見てるか
column2: Keeping an eye on yer range?

column1: 敵の状態に合わせた攻撃、ハンターなら当然
column2:
Adapt to the state of the target.
This is Hunter's way.

column1: 狙った獲物、逃すな
column2: Don't let your mark escape.

column1: 弱点、狙え
column2:
Weaknesses.
Aim for them.
